Package com.flipfit.dao

Class AdminDAO

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.dao.AdminDAO
public class AdminDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Admin-level operations in the FlipFit application. This class handles database interactions related to administrative tasks such as approving gyms, deleting users, and viewing pending requests.
Author:
YourName

  • Constructor Details

    • AdminDAO

      public AdminDAO(UserDAO userDao, CustomerDAO customerDao, GymOwnerDAO gymOwnerDao)
      Constructs an AdminDAO with necessary DAO dependencies.
      Parameters:
      userDao - The DAO for User operations.
      customerDao - The DAO for Customer operations.
      gymOwnerDao - The DAO for GymOwner operations.

  • Method Details

    • getPendingGymRequests

      public List<GymCentre> getPendingGymRequests()
      Retrieves a list of gym centers that are awaiting admin approval.
      Returns:
      A list of GymCentre objects with `approved` set to false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If a database access error occurs.

    • approveGymRequest

      public void approveGymRequest(int gymId)
      Approves a specific gym center by setting its `approved` status to true.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The unique identifier of the gym to be approved.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If the gym cannot be approved, or if the gymId does not exist.

    • getPendingGymOwnerRequests

      public List<User> getPendingGymOwnerRequests()
      Retrieves a list of gym owners who are awaiting admin approval. This method delegates the call to the GymOwnerDAO.
      Returns:
      A list of User objects representing pending gym owners.

    • approveGymOwnerRequest

      public void approveGymOwnerRequest(String email)
      Approves a gym owner's registration.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the gym owner to be approved.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If a database access error occurs or the email is not found.

    • getAllGyms

      public List<GymCentre> getAllGyms()
      Retrieves a list of all gym centers.
      Returns:
      A list of all GymCentre objects.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If a database access error occurs.

    • getAllGymOwners

      public List<User> getAllGymOwners()
      Retrieves a list of all approved gym owners. This method delegates the call to the UserDAO.
      Returns:
      A list of User objects representing gym owners.

    • getAllUsers

      public List<User> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all registered users. This method delegates the call to the UserDAO.
      Returns:
      A list of all User objects.

    • getAllCustomers

      public List<User> getAllCustomers()
      Retrieves a list of all registered customers. This method delegates the call to the UserDAO.
      Returns:
      A list of all User objects representing customers.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(int userId) throws UnableToDeleteUserException
      Deletes a user and all their associated data in a single transaction. This method is designed to handle the deletion of a user regardless of their role by attempting to delete from all possible role-specific tables.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier of the user to be deleted.
      Throws:
      UnableToDeleteUserException - If the user cannot be deleted, or if the transaction fails.

    • deleteGymById

      public void deleteGymById(int gymId)
      Deletes a gym center and all its associated data in a single transaction. This method ensures data integrity by deleting dependent records first.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The unique identifier of the gym to be deleted.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If the transaction fails or a database access error occurs.
